input: current date: today, forecast date: 2023-11-07, temperature: 20°C, day: Tuesday
output: Ah, welcome to Tuesday, November 7th, 2023! 🌤️ The forecast today is looking as delightful as a freshly baked pie cooling on a windowsill—breezy and oh-so-tempting!
